pinyin: Mai4 di2 xun4 Guang3 chang3 Hua1 yuan2
Mai4 di2 xun4 hua1 yuan2 guang3 chang3

sentences.english: "More than any other subject, weight is delicate, " Maddison said.
sentences.chinese: “體重問題比其他問題都要微妙，”麥迪遜說。

sentences.english: You can change at Madison avenue for the No. 15 bus.
sentences.chinese: 您可以到麥迪遜街換15路公共汽車。

sentences.english: I stepped outside and walked at a leisurely pace down Madison Ave.
sentences.chinese: 我走出屋外，邁着悠閒的步子沿着麥迪遜大街走着。

sentences.english: And he would take me when I was a kid to basketball games at Madison Square Garden.
sentences.chinese: 他總會帶着我這個小朋友去麥迪遜廣場花園看比賽。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about Madison Square?
sentences.chinese: 你可以跟我們講講麥迪遜廣場嗎？

sentences.english: I'm originally from Madison, Wisconsin in the Midwest.
sentences.chinese: 我來自中西部威斯康辛州的麥迪遜市。

sentences.english: I ran into her last year on Madison Avenue in midtown.
sentences.chinese: 我去年還在市中心的麥迪遜大道上撞見她。

sentences.english: On his bench in Madison Square Soapy moved uneasily.
sentences.chinese: 索比急躁不安地躺在麥迪遜廣場的長凳上。

sentences.english: CNN's Casey Wian is actually in Madison right now.
sentences.chinese: CNN記者凱西現在在州府麥迪遜。

sentences.english: Even a Starbucks on Madison Avenue didn't open.
sentences.chinese: 麥迪遜小道上標誌性的星巴克都罕有地打烊收歇。

sentences.english: Usually the creativity is not with the person who's playing at Madison Square Garden.
sentences.chinese: 通常，在麥迪遜廣場花園表演的人是缺乏創造力的。

sentences.english: Scene: Madison Square Garden, the guys are watching the game.
sentences.chinese: 麥迪遜花園廣場，都在看比賽。

sentences.english: Before B-school, she worked on Wall Street and Madison Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 再去商學院之前，她在華爾街和麥迪遜大街工作。

sentences.english: What kind of performances are usually held in Madison Square Garden?
sentences.chinese: 在麥迪遜廣場花園通常會舉行什麼樣的表演？

sentences.english: On Monday morning Jemmy sauntered on the road of Madison Square.
sentences.chinese: 星期一的上午傑米還在麥迪遜廣場的馬路上閒逛。

sentences.english: For how many years was Dolley Madison the first lady?
sentences.chinese: 多莉麥迪遜身居第一夫人有多少年的時間？

definition: abbr. for 聯合國大會|联合国大会[Lian2 he2 guo2 Da4 hui4], United Nations General Assembly/abbr. for 國立西南聯合大學|国立西南联合大学[Guo2 li4 Xi1 nan2 Lian2 he2 Da4 xue2], National Southwest Combined University
General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war
Zhu Kezhen (1890-1974), Chinese metereologist and geologist
University of International Relations, Beijing, established in 1949
pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Guan1 xi4 Xue2 yuan4

definition: variant of 弗吉尼亞州|弗吉尼亚州/Virginia, US state
